Reviews.Title: Bad product and without warranty
Reviews.Author: Luciano Montero
Reviews.Content: After four months of use the Z10 doesn't switch on any more. I can't obtain any solution either Blackberry, the Seller or Amazon.As i can see int the blogs this problema is very common

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Yamile C.
Reviews.Content: It does everything a Blackberry is supposed to do. I've had the phone for about 5 months and no problems. I see other people had issues, maybe a bad batch? Mine works a lot better than my old android.
